comments:

the synchronize icon (for a CVS sync of the workspace). I see a task
indefinitely "updating workspace" and the sync task wait forever. I can not
cancel either one. There is an exception in the log:

The NPE is coming from the Class loader. What VM are you using?

Sun JDK-1.4.2_08 for Win32 on Win2k Pro SP6.

Also, crashing with an Access Violation (not a NPE like in this case) in the CL
is a very common thing with Eclipse in my environment! I posted a bug report to
Sun, some months ago, but without a test case that reproduces the problem they
won't do anything of course. Let me know if and how I can provide more
information if necessary.

There's really nothing we can do in Eclipse to address this problem. Have you 
tried reinstalling the VM?

Oh, believe me, the VM install is totally fine. This is a bug that only appears
every now and then. But usually Eclipse just runs fine all day long.
